description:
Sticky header containing headline (with optional edit button)
and optional buttons

examples.title: example
examples.content:
<k-header>
	Headline

	<k-button-group slot="buttons">
		<k-button icon="open" variant="filled" />
		<k-button icon="cog" variant="filled" />
	</k-button-group>
</k-header>

slots.name: buttons
slots.description: Position for optional buttons opposite the headline
